column4: question.. ive run win os on my comp that i play games on and unix on my server laptop.. but question is i wanna change my gaming pc to unix/linux system.. but will i be able to play all my games? like wow, css, shadowbane, quake3 and so on  ?

some games like quake3 are available with linux native versions, other can be run with emulation software like codega, also if your PC is faxt enough you may be able to play games with windows running on VMware
